scenes.description: Gigi Murin and Oji-san perform the song 'Nikkori^^ Chousatai no Theme'.
Gigi Murin introduces her 3D debut merchandise and gives a closing speech.
Closing credits with a message to the fans (Grems).

subtitles.original: はい注目！
subtitles.english: Attention, please!

subtitles.original: にっこり調査隊！
subtitles.english: Smile Investigation Team!

subtitles.original: だいたいお茶の子さいさい
subtitles.english: It's mostly a piece of cake

subtitles.original: 保つ調査のていさい
subtitles.english: Maintaining the form of an investigation

subtitles.original: 今だ悪を鉄槌せんさい
subtitles.english: Now, hammer down on evil!

subtitles.original: 理事調査報告その１
subtitles.english: Investigation report part 1

subtitles.original: ペコは全然違います
subtitles.english: Peko is completely different

subtitles.original: おバカも全然違います
subtitles.english: Stupidity is also completely different

subtitles.original: ヤダー！めっちゃ怖～！
subtitles.english: No way! That's so scary!

subtitles.original: 諸君！大変です！
subtitles.english: Everyone! It's a disaster!

subtitles.original: 前前前世が足りてません
subtitles.english: We're lacking 'previous, previous, previous lives'!

subtitles.original: とりあえず！
subtitles.english: For now!

subtitles.original: とりあえず！
subtitles.english: For now!

subtitles.original: とりあえず待って珍道中だなあ
subtitles.english: For now, wait, what a weird journey

subtitles.original: だなあ！
subtitles.english: It sure is!

subtitles.original: お前が言うな！
subtitles.english: Look who's talking!

subtitles.original: 通知追加！
subtitles.english: Notification added!

subtitles.original: じゃあ持ち物チェック始めまーす！
subtitles.english: Then let's start the belongings check!

subtitles.original: ほいじゃいつもの！
subtitles.english: Then the usual!

subtitles.original: パス！パス！パスポート持った？
subtitles.english: Pass! Pass! Got your passport?

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: パンツ忘れた！
subtitles.english: I forgot my underwear!

subtitles.original: うわぁ！
subtitles.english: Whoa!

subtitles.original: モバイルバッテリー持った？
subtitles.english: Got your mobile battery?

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: 志は持った？
subtitles.english: Got your ambition?

subtitles.original: もーちろん！
subtitles.english: Of course!

subtitles.original: お国柄とか
subtitles.english: National character or whatever

subtitles.original: 老若男女
subtitles.english: Young and old, men and women

subtitles.original: あんまし関係ない
subtitles.english: It doesn't really matter

subtitles.original: ワールドワイドだぜ！
subtitles.english: We're worldwide!

subtitles.original: あっちも世界もまだまだ
subtitles.english: Over there and the world are still...

subtitles.original: 捨てたもんじゃないんだってば！
subtitles.english: not so bad after all!

subtitles.original: にっこりこりこりこりこりお利口さん
subtitles.english: Smile, smile, smile, smile, good little kid

subtitles.original: 陰キャも陽キャもウェルカムウェルカム！
subtitles.english: Introverts and extroverts, welcome, welcome!

subtitles.original: 君の笑顔が
subtitles.english: Your smile is...

subtitles.original: 調査対象さ！
subtitles.english: the object of our investigation!

subtitles.original: イェイイェイイェイイェイ！
subtitles.english: Yay yay yay yay!

subtitles.original: ファンダメンタルとかなんとかを
subtitles.english: With fundamentals and whatever

subtitles.original: 景気に一筆入魂エンターテイメン！
subtitles.english: as an opportunity, entertainment with a single soul-filled stroke!

subtitles.original: 私だっていつか夢を叶えてやるって We can do!
subtitles.english: Saying that I, too, will fulfill my dreams someday, We can do!

subtitles.original: さあにっこり満ち溢れて
subtitles.english: Now, overflowing with smiles

subtitles.original: もっと胸膨らみましたとさ
subtitles.english: My heart swelled even more, or so the story goes

subtitles.original: そのしょんぼりもにっこりに変換
subtitles.english: Convert that sadness into a smile too

subtitles.original: うちらに任せろメイクユアスマイル
subtitles.english: Leave it to us, make your smile

subtitles.original: 揚げの時だって
subtitles.english: Even when you're up...

subtitles.original: 下げの時だってかき混ぜちゃって
subtitles.english: ...or when you're down, mix it all up

subtitles.original: スパイスだって！完璧だ！
subtitles.english: even the spice! Perfect!

subtitles.original: にっこり！
subtitles.english: Smile!

subtitles.original: にっこりこりこりこりこりお利口さん
subtitles.english: Smile, smile, smile, smile, good little kid

subtitles.original: 大人も子供も関係なし！
subtitles.english: Adults or children, it doesn't matter!

subtitles.original: もちろん我々調査隊正座だ！
subtitles.english: Of course, our investigation team is sitting at attention!

subtitles.original: うぇい、うぇい、うぇい、うぇい、うぉー！
subtitles.english: Wei, wei, wei, wei, woo!

subtitles.original: 私だっていつか夢を叶えてやるって We can do!
subtitles.english: Saying that I, too, will fulfill my dreams someday, We can do!

subtitles.original: さあにっこり満ち溢れて
subtitles.english: Now, overflowing with smiles

subtitles.original: もっと胸膨らみましたとさ
subtitles.english: My heart swelled even more, or so the story goes

subtitles.original: That's not all!
subtitles.english: That's not all!

subtitles.original: That's right! You didn't expect this!
subtitles.english: That's right! You didn't expect this!

subtitles.original: Oh, you didn't expect this!
subtitles.english: Oh, you didn't expect this!

subtitles.original: There's 3D merch! Yay!
subtitles.english: There's 3D merch! Yay!

subtitles.original: You too, you watching at home...
subtitles.english: You too, you watching at home...

subtitles.original: ...can own your very own...
subtitles.english: ...can own your very own...

subtitles.original: ...Grems Hand-in Cushion!
subtitles.english: ...Grems Hand-in Cushion!

subtitles.original: What does that mean? You can put your hands in the Grems!
subtitles.english: What does that mean? You can put your hands in the Grems!

subtitles.original: You can remember all the good times that we had in the Grem Kingdom...
subtitles.english: You can remember all the good times that we had in the Grem Kingdom...

subtitles.original: ...with Oji-san! Yay! Yay!
subtitles.english: ...with Gramps! Yay! Yay!

subtitles.original: And you can do so many things with this Grems...
subtitles.english: And you can do so many things with this Grems...

subtitles.original: ...like stick your hands in it, which I said.
subtitles.english: ...like stick your hands in it, which I said.

subtitles.original: You can stick your hands in the Grems...
subtitles.english: You can stick your hands in the Grems...

subtitles.original: ...and you can sleep on it, and you can squish it...
subtitles.english: ...and you can sleep on it, and you can squish it...

subtitles.original: ...and you can cherish it, and you can love it...
subtitles.english: ...and you can cherish it, and you can love it...

subtitles.original: ...and it's very soft and very squishy.
subtitles.english: ...and it's very soft and very squishy.

subtitles.original: Just watch Oji-san play with it. Doesn't it look cool?
subtitles.english: Just watch Gramps play with it. Doesn't it look cool?

subtitles.original: 3Dお披露目グッズの登場じゃー！
subtitles.english: Behold the 3D debut merchandise!

subtitles.original: ヒャッホイ！うぉー！
subtitles.english: Hyahhoi! Woo!

subtitles.original: 見よ！このグレムのもちもちのハンドインクッションじゃよ。
subtitles.english: Look! It's this squishy Grems hand-in cushion.

subtitles.original: So cute.
subtitles.english: So cute.

subtitles.original: ヘッヘイ！いっぱい可愛がっておくれよ。
subtitles.english: Hehey! Please take good care of it.

subtitles.original: 頼んだぞ。イェーイ！
subtitles.english: I'm counting on you. Yay!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: Thank you everyone for coming to my 3D live today!
subtitles.english: Thank you everyone for coming to my 3D live today!

subtitles.original: I worked really, really hard on it.
subtitles.english: I worked really, really hard on it.

subtitles.original: And thank you to the staff who is, who is overseeing me...
subtitles.english: And thank you to the staff who is, who is overseeing me...

subtitles.original: ...and thank you for Oji-san for being here...
subtitles.english: ...and thank you for Oji-san for being here...

subtitles.original: ...and thank you for the Grems, and thank you for Mori Calliope...
subtitles.english: ...and thank you for the Grems, and thank you for Mori Calliope...

subtitles.original: ...and Nerissa, and Bae, and FuwaMoco, and Justice...
subtitles.english: ...and Nerissa, and Bae, and FuwaMoco, and Justice...

subtitles.original: ...for being here, a part of my 3D live!
subtitles.english: ...for being here, a part of my 3D live!

subtitles.original: This was so much fun! Oh, it was so awesome!
subtitles.english: This was so much fun! Oh, it was so awesome!

subtitles.original: Thank you, and I'm looking forward to doing more 3D things for you guys! Yay!
subtitles.english: Thank you, and I'm looking forward to doing more 3D things for you guys! Yay!

subtitles.original: Yippee! And don't forget, there is more 3D debuts next week...
subtitles.english: Yippee! And don't forget, there is more 3D debuts next week...

subtitles.original: ...so make sure you tune in because all of Justice has been working so hard, okay? Okay!
subtitles.english: ...so make sure you tune in because all of Justice has been working so hard, okay? Okay!

subtitles.original: Bye everyone! I'll see you later! Bye-bye!
subtitles.english: Bye everyone! I'll see you later! Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: Grems, thank you for being a part of my journey!
subtitles.english: Grems, thank you for being a part of my journey!

subtitles.original: Can you believe it? It’s been 1 year!!
subtitles.english: Can you believe it? It’s been 1 year!!

subtitles.original: Sometimes it still doesn’t feel real that I get to be here with you all,
subtitles.english: Sometimes it still doesn’t feel real that I get to be here with you all,

subtitles.original: and I’ll never take this feeling for granted.
subtitles.english: and I’ll never take this feeling for granted.

subtitles.original: You are my passion! You are my strength!
subtitles.english: You are my passion! You are my strength!

subtitles.original: I will keep working hard knowing that the shoebox will always be by my side.
subtitles.english: I will keep working hard knowing that the shoebox will always be by my side.

subtitles.original: I could say thank you a million times and it still wouldn’t feel enough.
subtitles.english: I could say thank you a million times and it still wouldn’t feel enough.

subtitles.original: But for all the times you’ve made me laugh, for the comfort you’ve brought me,
subtitles.english: But for all the times you’ve made me laugh, for the comfort you’ve brought me,

subtitles.original: the community we’ve created, the art you’ve shared, the stories you’ve crafted,
subtitles.english: the community we’ve created, the art you’ve shared, the stories you’ve crafted,

subtitles.original: the whimsy that you keep alive in your heart,
subtitles.english: the whimsy that you keep alive in your heart,

subtitles.original: the shoebox that you take such good care of,
subtitles.english: the shoebox that you take such good care of,

subtitles.original: for always supporting me, THANK YOU. stay silly! Gigi
subtitles.english: for always supporting me, THANK YOU. stay silly! Gigi
